casebody.data:
Gladys C. JOHNSON, Appellant, v. The PENN MUTUAL LIFE INSURANCE COMPANY, Appellee. No. 8068. Circuit Court of Appeals, Sixth Circuit. Jan. 17, 1940. George E. Beach, of Cleveland, Ohio, for appellant. George D. Bonebrake, of Cleveland, Ohio, for appellee.

Before ALLEN, HAMILTON, and ARANT, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed for the reasons given in the opinion of the District Court.
